title: Online Reflective Learning Program for Strengthening Pharmacy Preceptor Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational concepts in pharmaceutical education or mentoring
context.additional_context: Most learners are practicing pharmacists, combining real-time Zoom sessions and asynchronous video learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners watch 12 online episodes and submit reflective questions for each episode with an 80% or higher completion rate.
Learners achieve a confidence level of 4 or higher on a 5-point scale when performing the role of a preceptor after completing the training.
Learners rate their improvement in preceptoring competency at 7 or higher on a 10-point scale in a survey conducted three months after completing the training.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
